name: Dobuki's Epic Journey
storyline:
Dobuki, a lazy and clueless protagonist, wakes up to a galaxy ruled by the absurd Emperor LikWang. LikWang's face is plastered everywhere, but nobody seems to care. Determined to restore peace, Dobuki embarks on a comical journey across three planets: Metrozen, a city filled with self-obsessed beings; Udan, an ice planet; and Solaris, a sun-soaked resort planet.

Along the way, Dobuki encounters quirky characters, both friend and foe. Armed with toy hammer, he confronts various enemies in hilarious showdowns, filled with slapstick humor rather than serious combat.
summary: Embark on Dobuki's whimsical quest across three vibrant planets. Solve clever puzzles, battle quirky enemies, and save the galaxy from the clutches of Emperor Lik Wang in this charming blend of point-and-click adventure and RPG elements.
